signature_matches.name: create or open file
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: create or open file
    authors:
      - michael.hunhoff@mandiant.com
      - joakim@intezer.com
    lib: true
    scope: basic block
    mbc:
      - File System::Create File [C0016]
    examples:
      - B5F85C26D7AA5A1FB4AF5821B6B5AB9B:0x401D7E
  features:
    - or:
      - api: CreateFile
      - api: CreateFileEx
      - api: IoCreateFile
      - api: IoCreateFileEx
      - api: ZwOpenFile
      - api: ZwCreateFile
      - api: NtOpenFile
      - api: NtCreateFile
      - api: fopen
      - api: fopen64
      - api: fdopen
      - api: freopen
      - api: open
      - api: openat

signature_matches.name: create TCP socket
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: create TCP socket
    namespace: communication/socket/tcp
    authors:
      - william.ballenthin@mandiant.com
      - joakim@intezer.com
    scope: basic block
    mbc:
      - Communication::Socket Communication::Create TCP Socket [C0001.011]
    examples:
      - Practical Malware Analysis Lab 01-01.dll_:0x10001010
  features:
    - and:
      - number: 6 = IPPROTO_TCP
      - number: 1 = SOCK_STREAM
      - number: 2 = AF_INET
      - or:
        - api: ws2_32.socket
        - api: ws2_32.WSASocket
        - api: socket

signature_matches.name: contain loop
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: contain loop
    authors:
      - moritz.raabe@mandiant.com
    lib: true
    scope: function
    examples:
      - 08AC667C65D36D6542917655571E61C8:0x406EAA
  features:
    - or:
      - characteristic: loop
      - characteristic: tight loop
      - characteristic: recursive call

signature_matches.name: enumerate files on Linux
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: enumerate files on Linux
    namespace: host-interaction/file-system/files/list
    authors:
      - william.ballenthin@mandiant.com
    scope: function
    att&ck:
      - Discovery::File and Directory Discovery [T1083]
    examples:
      - 7351f8a40c5450557b24622417fc478d:0x405438
  features:
    - and:
      - os: linux
      - or:
        - and:
          - match: create or open file
          - or:
            - api: getdents
            - api: getdents64
        - and:
          - api: opendir
          - api: readdir

signature_matches.name: read file on Linux
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: read file on Linux
    namespace: host-interaction/file-system/read
    authors:
      - joakim@intezer.com
    scope: function
    mbc:
      - File System::Read File [C0051]
    examples:
      - 7351f8a40c5450557b24622417fc478d:0x4059AD
  features:
    - and:
      - os: linux
      - optional:
        - match: create or open file
      - or:
        - api: fgetc
        - api: fgets
        - api: getc
        - api: getchar
        - api: read
        - api: getline
        - api: getdelim
        - api: fgetwc
        - api: getwc
        - api: fscanf
        - api: vfscanf
        - api: fread

signature_matches.name: link function at runtime on Linux
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: link function at runtime on Linux
    namespace: linking/runtime-linking
    authors:
      - joakim@intezer.com
    scope: function
    att&ck:
      - Execution::Shared Modules [T1129]
  features:
    - and:
      - os: linux
      - or:
        - api: dlopen
        - api: dlmopen
      - or:
        - api: dlsym
        - api: dlvsym

signature_matches.name: write file on Linux
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: write file on Linux
    namespace: host-interaction/file-system/write
    authors:
      - joakim@intezer.com
    scope: function
    mbc:
      - File System::Writes File [C0052]
    examples:
      - 7351f8a40c5450557b24622417fc478d:0x401E14
  features:
    - and:
      - os: linux
      - or:
        - api: fputc
        - api: fputs
        - api: putc
        - api: write
        - api: fputwc
        - api: putwc
        - api: fputws
        - api: write
        - api: fwrite
        - api: putwchar
      - optional:
        - match: create or open file

signature_matches.name: execute command
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: execute command
    namespace: host-interaction/process/create
    authors:
      - "@mr-tz"
    scope: function
    mbc:
      - Process::Create Process [C0017]
    examples:
      - e353d3fbfb5c3738a77a622adff9a416:0x401626
  features:
    - or:
      - api: system
      - api: _system
      - api: wsystem
      - api: _wsystem

signature_matches.name: delete file
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: delete file
    namespace: host-interaction/file-system/delete
    authors:
      - moritz.raabe@mandiant.com
      - michael.hunhoff@mandiant.com
    scope: function
    mbc:
      - File System::Delete File [C0047]
    examples:
      - 946A99F36A46D335DEC080D9A4371940:0x100015F0
      # MoveFileEx
      - 31600AD0D1A7EA615690DF111AE36C73:0x401A15
      # NtDeleteFile
      - 563653399B82CD443F120ECEFF836EA3678D4CF11D9B351BB737573C2D856299:0x140001E04
  features:
    - or:
      - api: kernel32.DeleteFile
      - api: DeleteFileTransacted
      - api: NtDeleteFile
      - api: ZwDeleteFile
      - api: remove
      - api: _wremove
      - api: System.IO.File::Delete
      - basic block:
        - and:
          - number: 3 = FO_DELETE
          - or:
            - api: kernel32.SHFileOperation
      - basic block:
        - and:
          - number: 4 = MOVEFILE_DELAY_UNTIL_REBOOT
          - number: 0 = NULL
          - api: MoveFileEx

signature_matches.name: write and execute a file
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: write and execute a file
    namespace: c2/file-transfer
    maec/malware-category: launcher
    authors:
      - moritz.raabe@mandiant.com
    scope: function
    mbc:
      - Execution::Install Additional Program [B0023]
    examples:
      - 9324D1A8AE37A36AE560C37448C9705A:0x403A40
      - Practical Malware Analysis Lab 01-04.exe_:0x4011FC
  features:
    - and:
      - match: host-interaction/file-system/write
      - match: host-interaction/process/create

signature_matches.name: resolve DNS
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: resolve DNS
    namespace: host-interaction/network/dns/resolve
    authors:
      - william.ballenthin@mandiant.com
      - johnk3r
      - joakim@intezer.com
    scope: function
    mbc:
      - Communication::DNS Communication::Resolve [C0011.001]
    examples:
      - 17264e3126a97c319a6a0c61e6da951e:0x5FDC25D0
  features:
    - or:
      - api: ws2_32.gethostbyname
      - api: DnsQuery_A
      - api: DnsQuery_W
      - api: DnsQuery_UTF8
      - api: DnsQueryEx
      - api: getaddrinfo
      - api: GetAddrInfo
      - api: GetAddrInfoEx
      - api: gethostbyname
      - api: getaddrinfo
      - api: getnameinfo
      - api: gethostent

signature_matches.name: delay execution
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: delay execution
    authors:
      - michael.hunhoff@mandiant.com
      - "@ramen0x3f"
    lib: true
    scope: basic block
    mbc:
      - Anti-Behavioral Analysis::Dynamic Analysis Evasion::Delayed Execution [B0003.003]
    references:
      - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/sync/wait-functions
      - https://github.com/LordNoteworthy/al-khaser/blob/master/al-khaser/TimingAttacks/timing.cpp
    examples:
      - al-khaser_x86.exe_:0x449770
      - B5F85C26D7AA5A1FB4AF5821B6B5AB9B:0x402FA6
  features:
    - or:
      - and:
        - os: windows
        - or:
          - api: kernel32.Sleep
          - api: kernel32.SleepEx
          - api: kernel32.WaitForSingleObject
          - api: kernel32.SignalObjectAndWait
          - api: kernel32.WaitForSingleObjectEx
          - api: kernel32.WaitForMultipleObjects
          - api: kernel32.WaitForMultipleObjectsEx
          - api: kernel32.RegisterWaitForSingleObject
          - api: WaitOnAddress
          - api: user32.MsgWaitForMultipleObjects
          - api: user32.MsgWaitForMultipleObjectsEx
          - api: NtDelayExecution
          - api: KeWaitForSingleObject
          - api: KeDelayExecutionThread
      - and:
        - os: linux
        - or:
          - api: sleep
          - api: usleep

signature_matches.name: create TCP socket
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: create TCP socket
    namespace: communication/socket/tcp
    authors:
      - william.ballenthin@mandiant.com
      - joakim@intezer.com
      - anushka.virgaonkar@mandiant.com
    scope: basic block
    mbc:
      - Communication::Socket Communication::Create TCP Socket [C0001.011]
    examples:
      - Practical Malware Analysis Lab 01-01.dll_:0x10001010
  features:
    - or:
      - and:
        - number: 6 = IPPROTO_TCP
        - number: 1 = SOCK_STREAM
        - number: 2 = AF_INET
        - or:
          - api: ws2_32.socket
          - api: ws2_32.WSASocket
          - api: socket
      - property/read: System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient::Client

signature_matches.name: delete file
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: delete file
    namespace: host-interaction/file-system/delete
    authors:
      - moritz.raabe@mandiant.com
      - michael.hunhoff@mandiant.com
    scope: function
    mbc:
      - File System::Delete File [C0047]
    examples:
      - 946A99F36A46D335DEC080D9A4371940:0x100015F0
      # MoveFileEx
      - 31600AD0D1A7EA615690DF111AE36C73:0x401A15
      # NtDeleteFile
      - 563653399B82CD443F120ECEFF836EA3678D4CF11D9B351BB737573C2D856299:0x140001E04
  features:
    - or:
      - api: kernel32.DeleteFile
      - api: DeleteFileTransacted
      - api: NtDeleteFile
      - api: ZwDeleteFile
      - api: remove
      - api: _wremove
      - api: System.IO.File::Delete
      - api: System.IO.FileSystemInfo::Delete
      - basic block:
        - and:
          - number: 3 = FO_DELETE
          - or:
            - api: kernel32.SHFileOperation
      - basic block:
        - and:
          - number: 4 = MOVEFILE_DELAY_UNTIL_REBOOT
          - number: 0 = NULL
          - api: MoveFileEx

signature_matches.description: Sample and/or dropped files contains symbols with suspicious names
Executes the "uname" command used to read OS and architecture name
Executes commands using a shell command-line interpreter
Executes the "systemctl" command used for controlling the systemd system and service manager
Executes the "rm" command used to delete files or directories
URLs found in memory or binary data
Executes the "wget" command typically used for HTTP/S downloading
match_data: /usr/bin/wget -> wget --timeout 60 -U "wget/1.20.3-1ubuntu2 Ubuntu/20.04.4/LTS GNU/Linux/5.4.0-72-generic/x86_64 Intel(R)/Core(TM)2/CPU/6600/@/2.40/GHz cloud_id/none" -O- --content-on-error https://mo

signature_matches.description: Executes the "rm" command used to delete files or directories
Executes the "wget" command typically used for HTTP/S downloading
match_data: /usr/bin/wget -> wget --timeout 60 -U "wget/1.20.3-1ubuntu2 Ubuntu/20.04.4/LTS GNU/Linux/5.4.0-72-generic/x86_64 Intel(R)/Core(TM)/i7-3615QE/CPU/@/2.30GHz cloud_id/none" -O- --content-on-error https:/

signature_matches.description: Executes commands using a shell command-line interpreter
Executes the "systemctl" command used for controlling the systemd system and service manager

command_executions: wget --timeout 60 -U "wget/1.20.3-1ubuntu2 Ubuntu/20.04.4/LTS GNU/Linux/5.4.0-72-generic/x86_64 Intel(R)/Core(TM)2/CPU/6600/@/2.40/GHz cloud_id/none" -O- --content-on-error https://motd.ubuntu.com
wget --timeout 60 -U "wget/1.20.3-1ubuntu2 Ubuntu/20.04.4/LTS GNU/Linux/5.4.0-72-generic/x86_64 Intel(R)/Core(TM)/i7-3615QE/CPU/@/2.30GHz cloud_id/none" -O- --content-on-error https://motd.ubuntu.com
